remarks: In a domain, a product of nonzero elements is nonzero.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-May-2015.)
statement:
domneq0.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
domneq0.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
domneq0.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
domnmuln0 $p |- ( ( R e. Domn /\ ( X e. B /\ X =/= .0. ) /\ ( Y e. B /\ Y =/= .0. ) ) -> ( X .x. Y ) =/= .0. ) $.
